name: Sangonomiya Shrine
description:
End Phase: Heal all your characters for 1 HP.
Usage(s): 2
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Heal all your characters for 1 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Heal all your characters for 1 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 2</color>
storytext: "Sangonomiya was once an ocean abyss, until the Great Serpent came, forming a vortex with its spiral movements, and fashioning the coral into an island."
